nodes.text: A griffin was a supernatural creature with a long wingspan, green eyes, and colored feathers. On Mortis, the Force wielder known as the Daughter took on the form of a griffin that represented the embodiment of the light side of the Force. Her species was capable of shapeshifting and had no true physical form, and the griffin acted as her creature form. In contrast, the Daughter's brother, the Son, transformed into a gargoyle and embodied the dark side of the Force.
